Test Name: DIC/ICF Profile (Fibrinogen, D-dimer, PT, aPTT, Platelet Count)
Purpose: To analyze coagulation and fibrinolytic markers for diagnosing and managing disseminated intravascular coagulation/intravascular coagulation and fibrinolysis.
Equipment: Coagulation analyzer (e.g., ACL TOP, Siemens BCS XP) and automated hematology analyzer
